casebody.data:
Jeremy M. CARTER, Appellant,
v.
OUELLETTE & MAULDIN COURT REPORTERS, INC., Appellee. No. 3D17-645 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. Opinion filed June 13, 2018 Jeremy M. Carter, in proper person. Markowitz, Ringel, Trusty & Hartog, P.A., Alan Rosenberg and Adrian Delancy, for appellee. Before ROTHENBERG, C.J., and FERNANDEZ, and SCALES, JJ. PER CURIAM.

Affirmed.
